body: Worse thing as the ENG show, Asshole has been filming everything and selling it online! Somehow the Police never found this (or noted how he went missing right around when SHE went missing, you'd think the last possible person around her would get a look see! But NTR Logic, the police and authorities are useless till the plot demands it, I seriously can't understand why the writers try to add realism like her missing being noticed and reported, yet THIS gets overlooked till the "couple" snitch on themselves! Feels like asshole wants to gloat, but at least the slut knows her life is over once EX sees the video! She likely doesn't see the part where Coach is locked away and she's now publicly humiliated and her life and prospects are pretty much over because Coach wanted to look like a CHAD but instead became a chump)

not really surprised in ntr theres only 2 possible endings my bros, one is that the mc gets depressed/kills himself ,2 he faps on the video and being depressed ,and theres 3 this one the bitch films herself while having sex...wait its 4 actually the MC BECOMES A C.H.A.D
Love the art, hate the story
